Need a VPS , experience our fast KVM servers

what is a KVM SSD server ???

KVM is true virtualization where the VPS operates as its own server, independently of the host node. KVM has no restrictions in terms of functionality,
KVM is generally more stable than other virtualization server platform like openvz. So clearly you own a complete server with unique resources which no others can utilize.
